title: Add context generator that runs agent for context creation
description:
Implement the generator that invokes an AI agent to produce the context document.

## Requirements
- Uses the existing Agent interface
- Runs agent with context generation prompt
- Captures output as the context document
- Handles agent errors gracefully
- Respects budget limits for generation

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] `context.Generator` struct with `Generate(ctx, epic, tasks) (string, error)`
- [ ] Uses injected `agent.Agent` interface (testable)
- [ ] Passes prompt from PromptBuilder to agent
- [ ] Returns generated markdown content
- [ ] Timeout after configurable duration (default 5min)
- [ ] Logs generation start/complete events

## Budget Considerations
- Generation has separate budget from task execution
- Could use cheaper model (sonnet) for generation
- Max tokens: 50k, Max cost: $1.00 (configurable)
